0.name: {~00AAFF}Third Upgrade Mod Changelog 3.3.7}
0.text:
[*] Patched the 'Jebus Cross' template: It no longer crashes.
[*] 'Build Capitol in all cities' is no longer enabled by default.
[*] Updated Amethyst plugin: solved not being able to see info in combat with RMC.
[*] Updated New Towns plugin: Fixed a crash when you generate a random map, then build all the structures with 'wogminastirith' cheat.

1.name: {~FFE400}Wog options disabled for TUM}
1.text:
The following Wog Options are disabled by default in TUM due to incompatibilities:

[-] Rebalanced Creatures.
[-] Enhanced Monsters.
[-] Upg level 7 become level 8.
[-] Extended Upgrades.
[-] Adittional Uprades.
[-] Castle Upgrading.
[-] Rampart Farie Dragon.
[-] Buckler of Beelzebub.
[-] Enhanced Creatures.
[-] Combo artifacts from Enhanced Artifacts II.
[-] Monster Specialities from Hero Specialization Boosts.

2.name: {~347DEA}Before reporting, please check the following:}
2.text:
- If you experience constant random crashes, delete the mod and reinstall it.

- Close the game for proper installation.

- Try a new map if your current save file is experiencing errors.

- Try running the launcher as administrator to install the mod in case of false positives.

**There have been many unnecessary reports due to faulty mod installations. Please keep this in mind.
